page.title: Effects & Impact
page.subtitle: What does Kava feel like? A detailed description of the psychological and physical effects.

intro.paragraph1: Kava is often referred to as "nature's benzodiazepine", but this comparison is misleading. While it has strong anxiolytic and relaxing effects, it keeps the mind clear and focused, unlike alcohol or pharmaceutical sedatives.
intro.paragraph2: The state is often described as "active relaxation": one feels calm and content but is fully capable of action and socially open.

neurobiologie.title: Neurobiological Mechanisms
neurobiologie.intro: The effects of Kava are based on a complex interplay of various mechanisms in the brain:

mechanisms.title: GABA Receptor Modulation
mechanisms.description: Kavalactones bind to GABA-A receptors (similar to Valium), but at a different binding site. This enhances the effect of the body's own neurotransmitter GABA, leading to relaxation and anxiety relief.

mechanisms.title: Sodium & Calcium Channel Blockade
mechanisms.description: This reduces the excitability of nerve cells and is responsible for the muscle-relaxing and anticonvulsive (spasm-relieving) effect.

mechanisms.title: MAO-B Inhibition
mechanisms.description: Some Kavalactones inhibit the enzyme monoamine oxidase-B, which slows down the breakdown of dopamine. This explains the mildly euphoric and mood-enhancing effect.

mechanisms.title: Norepinephrine Reuptake Inhibition
mechanisms.description: Contributes to enhancing concentration without causing nervousness.

koerper.title: Physical Effects
koerper.paragraph1: The first sign of a good Kava effect is often a numbness in the mouth (local anesthetic effect of the Kavalactones).
koerper.paragraph2: This is followed by a wave of relaxation that often starts in the limbs. Muscle tensions dissolve, and the body feels "heavy" and pleasant. Pain (e.g., back pain) can be alleviated.

wirkungstypen.title: Heady, Heavy & Balanced
wirkungstypen.intro: Not all Kava works the same. Depending on the chemotype, three main categories are distinguished:

types.name: Heady
types.label: Head-heavy & Social
types.description: Dominated by Kavain. Has mood-enhancing, euphoric, and talkative effects. Ideal for daytime or social occasions. Does not cause much fatigue.

types.name: Heavy
types.label: Body-focused & Sedating
types.description: Dominated by Dihydrokavain and Methysticin. Has strong muscle-relaxing and sleep-promoting effects. The body feels heavy ("couch-lock"). Ideal for evenings.

types.name: Balanced
types.label: Balanced
types.description: A mix of both. Often starts "Heady" and then transitions into physical relaxation.

items.label: Onset
items.value: 10-20 minutes after ingestion (on an empty stomach).

items.label: Duration
items.value: The main effect lasts about 2-3 hours. A subtle relaxation ("afterglow") can last up to 6-8 hours.

items.label: Sleep
items.value: Kava promotes deep, restful sleep without a "hangover" the next morning. Many users report a particularly fresh awakening.
